name: Socket.io
body:
### Socket.io example chat
This project is for hosting socket.io chat server running on Heroku at https://fathomless-beyond-58796.herokuapp.com/

How to build and deploy on Heroku:

1.  Use [Git](https://git-scm.com/) to clone this project:
    git clone https://github.com/datjandra/socket.io.git

2.  Download and install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/)

3.  Download and install [Heroku Toolbelt](https://toolbelt.heroku.com/)

4.  Build the project locally in socket.io directory:
    npm install

5.  Start the process locally:
    heroku local

6.  Go to http://localhost:3000 and verify that chat server is running.

7.  If there are no errors then create a new instance on Heroku:
    heroku create

8.  Push code to heroku:
    heroku push master
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
